text.Prompt:
Using the item keywords and item name, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Item name:
United States Army Three Shade Gameroom Lamp, 60"

Item keywords:
Lamp Dimensions: 14 x 14 x 9.5-Inch
Officially Licensed Art on Both Sides of Each Polyresin Lamp Shade
Metal Hardware and Chain, Cord Mounted ON/OFF Switch,2 Hanging Chains with Hanging Hardware Measure 53.5-Inch in Length Each
110V Household Outlets, Recommended Bulb Wattage: 60W (Requires 3 Bulbs, Not Included),Three Prong Cord Measures 58-Inch in Length
Overall Dimensions: 14 x 60 x 9.5-Inch

Product description:
text.Response A: This officially licensed US Army three-shade gameroom lamp is sure to light up any room. The lamp measures 14 x 14 x 9.5 inches and is made of metal and polyresin. The three-prong cord is 58 inches long. The lamp uses 60-watt bulbs (not included) and comes with two 53.5-inch-long hanging chains with hardware.
text.Response B: Bring your game room to life with the United States Army Three Shade Gameroom Lamp! This officially licensed product features stunning artwork on both sides of each polyresin lampshade, showcasing the pride and glory of the US Army. With a sturdy metal hardware and chain, this lamp is built to last. The overall dimensions of the lamp are 14 x 60 x 9.5 inches, and it requires three bulbs with a recommended wattage of 60W (bulbs not included). The two hanging chains with hanging hardware measure 53.5 inches in length each, and the three-prong cord measures 58 inches. This lamp is designed to be used with 110V household outlets and comes with an ON/OFF switch attached to the cord. Add a touch of military pride to your game room with the United States Army Three Shade Gameroom Lamp.

meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.

The two hanging chains with hanging hardware measure 53.5 inches in length each, and the three-prong cord measures 58 inches. This lamp is designed to be used with 110V household outlets and comes with an ON/OFF switch attached to the cord.
